title: BRIEF-Globo says postpones proposed issue of notes due to market conditions
text:
BRIEF-Globo says postpones proposed issue of notes due to market conditions 
Oct 21 Globo Plc : 
* Has postponed proposed issue of senior secured high yield notes due to market conditions 
* Without financing scale deals will be smaller than previously thought, but company will continue to explore major acquisition opportunities Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136) Trending On Reuters
